tools.name: apple-health
tools.description: Connect your iPhone and Apple Watch to your bot for sleep, HRV, readiness, activity, and vitals. Uses the free Health Auto Export app as a bridge. Works standalone or alongside Oura Ring. Includes a Health Agent for biometric insights, medication lookups, and symptom guidance.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up Apple Watch health integration"

tools.name: garmin
tools.description: Connect to Garmin Connect for exercise data, running workouts, training load, Body Battery, and VO2 max. Designed to complement Oura Ring (sleep) and Apple Health (steps). Uses the garminconnect Python library with OAuth token caching â€” no official API key required.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up Garmin Connect integration"

tools.name: fireflies
tools.description: Auto-capture meeting summaries and action items from Fireflies.ai. Stores summaries as memory facts and action items as trackable goals with Telegram notifications.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up Fireflies.ai integration"

tools.name: flightaware
tools.description: Real-time flight tracking via FlightAware AeroAPI. One-time lookups, active tracking with proactive Telegram notifications, morning briefing integration, and cost guardrails.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up FlightAware flight tracking"

tools.name: google-api
tools.description: Connect to Google Calendar and Sheets using lightweight Python CLI scripts and a TypeScript client. Read/create events, read/write spreadsheets, and use data in briefings.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up Google Calendar and Sheets integration"

tools.name: ms365
tools.description: Connect to Outlook Calendar, Email, and Microsoft To Do via the Microsoft Graph API. Read/write calendar events, check inbox, manage tasks, and include data in morning briefings.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up Microsoft 365 integration"

tools.name: oura-ring
tools.description: Connect to an Oura Ring for sleep, readiness, activity, and stress data. Includes a Health Agent board member for biometrics, medication lookups, symptom checking, and wellness guidance.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up Oura Ring integration"

tools.name: security-audit
tools.description: A 5-phase security audit prompt for any codebase. Maps attack surface, identifies injection/auth/crypto/config vulnerabilities, classifies by severity, and walks through fixes one at a time.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code while in your project directory. Paste the prompt and let it run.

tools.name: security-sentinel
tools.description: Autonomous security scanning agent for VPS and web infrastructure. 80+ checks across auth, TLS, headers, VPS hardening, API credentials, and dependencies. SOC2, HIPAA, and PCI-DSS compliance reporting. Optional AI analysis via Ollama or Claude API.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: cd into the installed directory, run 'bun install', copy .env.example to .env, fill in your values, then run 'bun run scan'. Or open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up Security Sentinel for my infrastructure"

tools.name: supabase-to-convex
tools.description: Step-by-step migration from Supabase to Convex with zero downtime. Backend adapter pattern with instant rollback at every phase. Preserves all data and embeddings.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Start the Convex migration"

tools.name: teams
tools.description: Add Microsoft Teams as a second messaging platform. Synchronized conversations across Telegram and Teams, Adaptive Cards for human-in-the-loop, and hybrid VPS routing.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up Teams integration"

tools.name: tempest-weather
tools.description: Connect to a WeatherFlow Tempest personal weather station for live conditions and 5-day forecasts. Bypasses Claude for speed and accuracy with direct API calls.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up Tempest weather integration"

tools.name: voice-interface
tools.description: Add two voice interfaces: Telegram voice notes (Gemini STT + Speaktor TTS) and a web push-to-talk interface (Web Speech API + OpenAI TTS). Per-agent voice mapping.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up voice interface"

tools.name: vps-hardening
tools.description: A 9-phase VPS security hardening prompt. SSH lockdown, Fail2Ban with progressive bans, UFW firewall, Cloudflare origin protection, Docker-aware rules, auto-updates, and more.
tools.author: tk-47
tools.postInstall: Open prompt.md while connected to your VPS via Claude Code. Paste the prompt and follow the steps.
